title: Google Assistant gets its first meaningful update in a long time: Two new voices

title: The customizable lock screen is working in Android 14 beta 3, check it out!
description: You'll be having a lot of fun making your lock screen your own with this new feature.

title: Reddit relents, makes first concession in its plans to impair third-party apps
description: If a third-party Reddit app primarily exists for accessibility purposes, Reddit will leave it alone.

description: Platform Stability is a significant milestone signifying that most of the work is done.

title: The Beats Flex earbuds are worth a look at a new low price of $29.99

title: Minecraft now available natively on Chromebooks

title: Apple is stealing a trick from the Steam Deck for macOS gaming
